夾.definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]

夾七夾八.definition: completely mixed up; in a muddle

夾塞兒.definition: to cut into a line; queue-jumping

夾尾巴.definition: to have one's tail between one's legs

夾層.definition: hollow layer between two solid layers; (architecture) mezzanine

夾山國家森林公園.pinyin: Jia1 shan1 Guo2 jia1 Sen1 lin2 Gong1 yuan2
夾山國家森林公園.definition: Jiashan National Forest Park in Shimen 石門|石门[Shi2 men2], Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan

夾山寺.definition: Jiashan Temple, Buddhist temple in Shimen county 石門縣|石门县[Shi2 men2 xian4], Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan, the purported final home and burial place of late Ming peasant rebel leader Li Zicheng 李自成[Li3 Zi4 cheng2]

夾帶.definition: to carry within it; to be mixed in; to slip sth in; to intersperse; (hydrology etc) to entrain; to smuggle; notes smuggled into an exam

夾心.definition: to fill with stuffing (e.g. in cooking); stuffed

夾心餅乾.definition: sandwich cookie; (jocular) sb who is caught between two opposing parties; sb who is between the hammer and the anvil

夾擊.definition: pincer attack; attack from two or more sides; converging attack; attack on a flank; fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks

夾攻.definition: attack from two sides; pincer movement; converging attack; attack on a flank; fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks

夾斷.definition: to nip (i.e. cut short); to pinch off

夾板.definition: wooden boards used to press sth together; (medicine) splint

夾江.definition: Jiajiang county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

夾江縣.definition: Jiajiang county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

夾生.definition: half-cooked; (fig.) not completely done, solved, developed etc; Taiwan pr. [jia4 sheng5]

夾生飯.definition: half-cooked rice; (fig.) half-finished job that is difficult to complete because it was not done properly in the first instance; Taiwan pr. [jia4 sheng5 fan4]

夾當兒.definition: erhua variant of 夾當|夹当[jia1 dang1]

夾竹桃.definition: oleander (Nerium indicum); Taiwan pr. [jia4 zhu2 tao2]

夾肢窩.definition: armpit; also written 胳肢窩|胳肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]

夾襖.definition: lined jacket; double layered jacket; CL:件[jian4]

夾起尾巴.definition: to tuck one's tail between one's legs; fig. to back down; in a humiliating situation

夾道.definition: a narrow street (lined with walls); to line the street

夾道歡迎.definition: to line the streets in welcome

夾雜.definition: to mix together (disparate substances); to mingle; a mix; to be tangled up with
